song.title: You Left Me Behind
song.info:
I got home late And I found your note on the kitchen table The writing so perfect There's no sign of emotion The words inside Blurred from tears in my eyes You said that were leaving And you said that you'd tried
Oh why, did you have to leave You might as well stick a knife in my heart And leave me to die Why did you have to leave It feels like you've stabbed me in the heart When you left me to die
Well there's nothing left to say For too many things have already been said And if I can't make you love me Then I guess it has to end here Gave no reasons, made no accusations Don't know why you want to leave me But it's too late to fight for you
Oh why [tell me why], did you have to leave You might as well stick a knife in my heart And leave me to die Why [tell me why] did you have to leave It feels like you've stabbed me in the heart When you left me, you left me to die
